full_summary:
===============

### Trauma Suite Storage Container
#### RFP for the Provision of One Trauma Suite Storage Container

[ Publication Date: 2024-06-24 | Closing Date: 2024-08-05 16:00:00 ]

**Tender Details**
----------------

*   **Tender Reference:** cb-184-23327426-ammod1
*   **Solicitation Number:** W6399-25-SL04
*   **Procurement Category:**  Goods and Services
*   **Trade Agreements:**  Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
*   **Procurement Method:FORCEON**  Competitive, Open Bidding

**Contract Details**
------------------

*   **Contracting Entity:** National Defence Headquarters
*   **Contracting Entity Address:** 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada, K1A 0K2
*   **Contact Information:** Sabrina Lafleur | [Sabrina.Lafleur@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Sabrina.Lafleur@forces.gc.ca) | (613) 998-4898
*   **Tender Description:** The Department of National Defense requires one Trauma Suite Storage (TSS container) to support medical operations on deployments. There will be an option to extend the contract for a period of 1 year for 1 additional container.

**Bidding Requirements**
-------------------------

*   **Submission Details:** Interested vendors should submit their proposals electronically by the closing date specified above.
*   **Selection Criteria:** The successful vendor will be selected based on the lowest price.

**Attachments**
---------------

*   **Tender Notice:** The full notice, including the complete solicitation, can be downloaded from [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/40919/w6399-25-sl04-rfp-for-trauma-suite-storage-container.pdf)
*   **French Version of Tender Notice:** The French version of the notice is available at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/40919/w6399-25-sl04-rfp-for-trauma-suite-storage-container_french.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/40919/w6399-25-sl04-rfp-for-trauma-suite-storage-container_french.pdf)

Please note
